column4: does anyone have an idea what might be going wrong here? i'm trying to setup a mail server, but when ever i try to send mail to anywhere, the recipients server refuses the connection
i'm not very useful at this level of linux admin :) which specifics do you think would help debug the problem?
"/var/mail.info" would be a start if you are using postfix
what do want to with the mailserver
no his level in english says 14
I have no glue on sendmail, I would switch to postfix...
